A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This film is the most Star Wars-esque film since Empire Strikes Back. Why are people so annoyed? People are complaining about unresolved plot points when we still have a whole other film to wait for. I admit it definitely wasn't what I expected but at least it was better than I expected. I would watch this again\, for sure. People need to lighten up and actually think for a second - if everything was to stay the same then it would get boring\, don't expect it to be exactly like the first one.
